list.title: Client
list.description: Implementation of a mascara client. Connects to a mascara {@link Server} and automatically transforms stream arguments into mascara:// links and vice-versa.

list.title: Client#connect
list.description: Passthrough function that calls the underlying {@link Client~AbstractClient}'s connect() method

list.title: Client#invoke
list.description: Constructs a mascara message from the given arguents and handles the response

list.title: Server
list.description: Implementation of a mascara server. Takes an API definition and routes JSON-RPC messages to their handlers, automatically transforming mascara:// links into streams.

list.title: Server#listen
list.description: Passthrough function that calls the underlying {@link Server~AbstractServer}'s listen() method
